name: Gradiente Suave
css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea, #764ba2);

name: Gradiente 1
css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff006e, #8338ec, #3a86ff);

name: Ruido 1
Gradiente Amanecer
css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9a9e 0%, #fad0c4 99%, #fad0c4 100%); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Gradiente Oceánico
css: background: linear-gradient(to top, #30cfd0 0%, #330867 100%); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Patrón Cuadrícula
css: background-color: #1e293b; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 40px 40px; background-attachment: fixed;

name: Mesh Vibrante
css: background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 20%, #ff6ec4, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 80%, #7873f5, transparent 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Orb Magenta
css: background: #020617; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(71,85,105,0.15) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(71,85,105,0.15) 1px, transparent 1px), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 60%, rgba(236,72,153,0.15) 0%, rgba(168,85,247,0.05) 40%, transparent 70%); background-size: 40px 40px, 40px 40px, 100% 100%; background-attachment: fixed;

name: Ruido Sutil
css: background-color: #111827; background-image: radial-gradient(circle at 1px 1px, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 0); background-size: 20px 20px; background-attachment: fixed;

name: Gradiente Fuego
css: background: linear-gradient(45deg, #f12711, #f5af19); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Glassmorphism
css: background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1), rgba(255,255,255,0)); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Radial Aurora
css: background: radial-gradient(circle at center, #00c6ff, #0072ff, #004d99); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Crimson Depth
css: background: radial-gradient(125% 125% at 50% 100%, #000000 40%, #2b0707 100%); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Sunset Horizon
css: background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #ff7e5f, #feb47b); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Carbon Fiber
css: background-color: #1c1c1c; background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.02) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(255,255,255,0.02) 75%), linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.02) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 75%, rgba(255,255,255,0.02) 75%); background-size: 20px 20px; background-position: 0 0, 10px 10px; background-attachment: fixed;

name: Mint Mesh
css: background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, #a1ffce, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 70% 70%, #faffd1, transparent 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, #283e51, #485563); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Starfield
css: background-color: #000; background-image: radial-gradient(1px 1px at 10% 20%, #fff, transparent), radial-gradient(1px 1px at 80% 70%, #fff, transparent), radial-gradient(1px 1px at 50% 50%, #fff, transparent); background-size: cover; background-attachment: fixed;

name: Aurora Borealis
css: background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, #00c3ff, transparent 40%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 70%, #ff8c00, transparent 40%), linear-gradient(180deg, #000428, #004e92); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Cyber Grid
css: background-color: #0f0f0f; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,255,255,0.1) 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 40px 40px; background-attachment: fixed;

name: Peach Dream
css: background: linear-gradient(120deg, #f6d365 0%, #fda085 100%); background-attachment: fixed;

name: Neon Lights
css: background-color: #000000; background-image: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 30%, rgba(255,0,255,0.3) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 70%, rgba(0,255,255,0.3) 0%, transparent 50%); background-attachment: fixed;
